questions.title: Which pill would you take?
questions.tip: You take the blue pill — the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill—you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.

questions.title: What I am talking about?
questions.tip: You don't know what it is but it's there, like a splinter in your mind driving you mad. It is this feeling that has brought you to me.

questions.title: What is the Matrix?
options: It's all about a real life
It is the world that has been pulled over your eyes to blind you from the truth

questions.title: Why don't you believe in fate, Neo?
options: The life is more complicated thing than you think
I don't like the idea that I'm not in control of my life
What are you talking about. What... what is happening to me?

questions.title: How would you know the difference between the dream world and the real world?
questions.tip: Have you ever had a dream, Neo, that you were so sure was real? What if you were unable to wake from that dream?
options: Nevermind, I am The One. I can deal with it
Emm.. actually, I don't know. Let me ask the agent Smith
